name: K2MU
description:
Knife things up in this strange 16-bit arcade game!

How to play:

Use your mouse to point the knife towards the enemies and use the primary button to move into your mouse cursor's position; Knife everything you can and avoid the DANGER!!!

Credits:

Music, Graphics. Code, Character design, UI design: Neil Wolfkid

Original game, Ideas, Main mechanic, Moral support: Anything Anarchy

Original game: Anything Anarchy's Knife To Meet You
